content: Back in NYC with a suitcase full of stories and a heart full of Japan. Time to plan a cultural exchange event. Let's see if I can make it happen.
raw_content: Excited and a bit nervous to head back to NYC. Japan has truly changed me, now I'm eager to organize a cultural exchange event there to share these incredible experiences. #JapanToNYC #CulturalExchange

content: Just turned 22 and now I'm at an AI workshop in NYC. If my trading algorithms start quoting poetry, you'll know why.
raw_content: Just turned 22 and diving into an AI workshop in NYC. The intersection of tech and creativity is sparking new ideas for my trading algorithms. Excited to see how this will shape my next project. #AIDev #TechBirthday
